title: Development of Active Design Strategies for Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic language instruction competencies and leadership experience
context.additional_context: Capacity-building programs for corporate language education coordinators targeting managers/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more active learning strategies applicable in online environments.
Participants can evaluate language learning activities based on authentic e-learning principles.
Instructional designers can derive improvements for online courses by utilizing the Design-Based Research (DBR) methodology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
